>What build of Eclipse did this occur in?

Eclipse Platform

Version: 3.0.0
Build id: 200312182000

It has happened a couple of times now. I suspect it might have have something 
to do with starting debugging of partially built projects.

?yvind

Usually JIT bugs. For now we will close, unless there is a repeatable test 
case.

It happened twice yesterday when I was toying w/CVS & debugging.

Is it important enough that I should go after it?

?yvind

If you can narrow down a test case to send to us, that would be much 
appreciated.

Fixed.
The two synchronized blocks were not using the same lock. In some unlucky cases,
fNextJob was set to null between the if test and the call to #computeText(..).
Change in DebugViewLabelDecorator.

Please verify, Jared.
